channel.title: Near-Fatality New Server! Online 24/7 Great Community &nd Staff! Come And Join!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3156113/naamloos.png[/img]
[center][size=18pt]Near-Fatality[/size]
[size=14pt]It is created with a group of developers and active and helpful staff! The server strive's for the best.
Near-Fatality includes unique features, adjustable XP rate, active community, daily updated forums and great benefits!
- VPS Hosted - VBulletin Forums - No lag - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Active Clean Forums - Working Vote & Rewards - DonatorZone (with shops) - Various shops. - Friendly staff. - Curses, ancients etc. - Working chaotics - Great staff and owner's! - Fully working slayer and slayer tower! - Great PvP and switching - Perfect switching - Duel arena - & So much more!
http://www.nearfatality.com/forum.php
Click the link and join the group!
What you have to do ? Registr on our forums Make a account in game And enjoy playing!
We hope to see you soon!
Best Regards[/center][/size][/center]
